blocks.value: The Virtues, also known as Strongholds, are associated with acts of heroism and the working of miracles. They channel God's grace into the material world.
Virtues infuse courage, grace, and valor into the hearts of saints and martyrs. They strengthen those who are struggling and inspire acts of great faith and heroism.
These angels also govern the movements of the heavenly bodies and maintain the order of nature. Through them, God performs signs and wonders to reveal His presence and power.
